content:
# The error indicates that I do not have enough stone in my inventory to craft additional stone furnaces. 
# I need to gather more stone before I can proceed with crafting.

# Step 14: Gather more stone
# I will move to the nearest stone resource and collect enough stone to craft the additional furnaces.

move_to(nearest(Resource.Stone))  # Move to the nearest stone resource
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=10)  # Gather additional stone
print(f"Updated inventory after collecting more stone: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check my inventory again
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the current state of entities on the map for reference.
